column1: #Text=[0187] This module contains the master tables used to configure the wind farm, in addition to the forms and subroutines necessary to alter and install this configuration.
#Text=These tables are linked to by the other modules as needed.
#Text=[0189] The acquisition module acquires ten-minute and error data from the SCADA database (calc.mdb) and using appends this data to the Data module tables.
#Text=Some conversion takes place in this process in order to put the data in a more editable and reportable form.
#Text=In addition, once the data is acquired successfully, the older data still remaining in the SCADA database tables is deleted.
#Text=[0190] The acquisition module has two operating modes built in, manual and auto.
#Text=[0191] The manual mode is activated by simply opening the database and allows the operator to force the immediate collection of data from the SCADA database.
